org.gnocchigames.dragonboat.score

Class ScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gnocchigames.dragonboat.score.ScoreBoard

  • public class ScoreBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    ScoreBoard to store all the times of the players. Also provides functions to draw scoreboard.

        public void computeRoundEndScores()
